column4: On this page: http://www.ubuntulinux.nl/source-o-matic, you have an option to select "Packages" and "Sources". What are the "Sources"? Are they source codes or what?
okay, so if i dont do any development, i wouldn't need them right?

sources can be used for development purposes or you can 'build' the package for your distribution using the appropriate commands. Unless you are trying to installl some obscure software there is little chance you will need to use it in Ubuntu as many of the most common aps can be installed directly
